All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.swing.Action, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, java.io.Serializable
public class EventBusAction
extends EventServiceAction

When fired, this action publishes events on the EventBus.

Method Detail

getEventService

protected EventService getEventService(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt)
Specified by:
getEventService in class EventServiceAction
Parameters:
evt - the event passed to #execute(ActionEvent)

Gets the EventService from EventServiceAction.getEventService(ActionEvent evt). Gets event from EventServiceAction.getEventServiceEvent(java.awt.event.ActionEvent) if null, gets the topic name from EventServiceAction.getTopicName(java.awt.event.ActionEvent) and the topic value from if null, gets the topic name from EventServiceAction.getTopicValue(java.awt.event.ActionEvent). Published the event or the value on the topic on the EventService.

Returns:
the event service to publish on, if null and getThrowsExceptionOnNullEventService() is true (default) and exception is thrown
